knownIssues.summary:
Some customers have observed that they see an error similar to the following when pulling related entities after a custom object gets renamed.

ERROR running force:source:pull:  Entity of type 'CustomField' named 'MyObject__c.MyField__c' cannot be found

Cannot retrieve translation for object:AcmeIncExample__MyObject__c.

The expected error is that SFDX appears to conflate the two namespaces, resulting in SFDX looking for an Object that does not exist:
knownIssues.title: Errors pulling related entities after a custom object gets renamed
